## Urgency

<!-- How urgent is this revert? -->

- [ ] Critical - Production is broken, revert immediately
- [ ] High - Significant impact, revert as soon as possible
- [ ] Medium - Notable issues, revert in next release
- [ ] Low - Minor issues, can be scheduled
